overview: A chance encounter with a random stranger sets in motion a series of events that lead to the total collapse of Dylan Gray, a young career-driven architect with the world in the palm of his hand. His green-based architecture firm has just landed its first commission to design a major skyscraper in Seattle. Before the project can begin, Dylan's life becomes skillfully unraveled by a spiteful identity thief who sets out to destroy his world.
title: Selfless
